definition: to focus light (e.g. in theater)/to spotlight
to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: Also, we can finally turn the spotlights off.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我们也终于能关上那盏聚光灯了。

sentences.english: Many spot lights towards a central point on a piece of white paper.
sentences.chinese: 众多的聚光灯都照向一张白纸的中心点。

sentences.english: This week we put these issues under the spotlight in a series of articles.
sentences.chinese: 本周，我们把这些问题置于一系列文章的聚光灯下。

sentences.english: Don't put the ads will shorten to not stood on tiptoe can see the place.
sentences.chinese: 不要把聚光点缩短到不踮起脚尖就可以看到的地方。

sentences.english: In the second part, a novel dual-coupling condensor is presented.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分论述了双路耦合聚光系统的设计。

sentences.english: Concentrated solar power and photovoltaics represent two different technology paths.
sentences.chinese: 聚光太阳能发电与太阳能电池是两种不同的技术途径。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the focusing principle of spherical heliostat.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了球面定日镜的聚光原理。

sentences.english: Early in his disease, Muhammad shied away from the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 在患病初期，穆罕默德远离了媒体的聚光灯。

sentences.english: Through spotlights cost reducing and frequency division utilization it improves system efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 通过聚光降低成本，通过分频综合利用提高系统效率。

sentences.english: You think you're important, which is why the spotlight effect exists.
sentences.chinese: 你觉得自己很重要，所以就有聚光灯效应存在。

sentences.english: In the paper the results are presented of investigation of sun-tracking and concentrating system.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了对太阳能跟踪聚光系统的研究结果。

sentences.english: Spotlights pre-wired to a cable can be used to illuminate landscape features.
sentences.chinese: 聚光灯前的有线电缆可以用来照明景观特色。

sentences.english: Characteristics of sun-tracking system of concentrator are analyzed in the dissertation at first.
sentences.chinese: 论文首先分析了聚光器太阳跟踪的特点。

sentences.english: That is because the heavy snows that have been accumulating in central China were falling on places far out of the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 那是因为华中积聚的大雪降落在远离聚光灯的地方。

sentences.english: Everyone involved in a conversation should get their time in the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 一场谈话的每一个人都希望自己能一直在聚光灯下。

sentences.english: It adopts solid lighting system instead of spherical spotlighting system.
sentences.chinese: 照明系统采用了固体光源，非球面聚光系统。
